Package jester

Class JesterMath

java.lang.Object
jester.JesterMath
public class JesterMath extends Object
JesterMath provides various mathematical functions and utilities, including random number generation, trigonometric functions, and more.

      Calculates the direction from one point to another in radians.
      Parameters:
      x1 - The x-coordinate of the starting point.
      y1 - The y-coordinate of the starting point.
      x2 - The x-coordinate of the target point.
      y2 - The y-coordinate of the target point.
      Returns:
      The angle in radians from the starting point to the target point.
